spec_data.Name: perl-Perl-Critic-Compatibility
spec_data.Description:
Some Perl::Critic policies that will help you keep your code compatible with
other versions of Perl, regardless of the version that you're developing with.
This includes both backward and forward compatibility.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:02:56 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl::Critic policies for compatibility with Perl versions
